Answers.info: A service is a transaction in which no physical goods are transferred from the seller to the buyer. It can be B2C or B2B
A product is an object or system made available for consumer use; it is anything that can be offered to a market to satisfy the desire or need of a customer
It does not fit in both categories but I can create a business model that gets revenue and has potential to change the world
